results.name: Number of compact partitions of n containing a 1 where each partition is counted with a certain weight.
comment: See Andrews (2016) for the definition of the particular weight used here.
link: George E. Andrews, The Bhargava-Adiga Summation and Partitions, 2016. See Lemma 2.2.
maple: for j from 0 to M do
